<nav class="progress" aria-label="Checkout Steps">
    <ol>
        <li class="has-link"><a href="#"><span aria-hidden="true">Step 1</span><span class="name"> Shipping</span></a></li>
        <li class="active"><span aria-hidden="true">Step 2</span><span class="name"> Billing</span></li>
        <li><span aria-hidden="true">Step 3</span><span class="name"> Place Order</span></li>
    </ol>
</nav>
 
<nav class="progress" aria-label="Checkout Steps">
	<ol>
		<li class="has-link"><a href="#"><span aria-hidden="true">Step 1</span><span class="name"> Shipping</span></a></li>
		<li class="active"><span aria-hidden="true">Step 2</span><span class="name"> Billing</span></li>
		<li><span aria-hidden="true">Step 3</span><span class="name"> Place Order</span></li>
	</ol>
</nav>
 
/* No context defined for this component. */
  • Content: 
    .progress {
    margin-bottom: px-to-rem(40px);

    ol {
        @include remove-list();
        display: flex;
        margin-bottom: 0;
    }

    li {
        @extend h2;
        margin-bottom: 0;
        width: 33.33%;
        text-align: center;
        font-size: px-to-rem(18px);
        color: $dove-gray;
        padding: px-to-rem(16.4px) px-to-rem(4px);
        border-left: 8px solid $white;
        border-right: 8px solid $white;

        &.active {
            position: relative;
            color: $zuccini;
        
            &::after {
                content: '';
                position: absolute;
                bottom: 0;
                left: 0;
                width: 100%;
                height: px-to-rem(2px);
                background-color: $zuccini;
            }
        }

        &.has-link {
            padding: 0;
        }
    }

    a {
        position: relative;
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        color: $zuccini;
        background-color: transparent;
        padding: px-to-rem(16.4px) px-to-rem(4px);

        &:hover, &:focus {
            color: $zuccini;
            text-decoration: none;

            &::after {
                content: '';
                position: absolute;
                bottom: 0;
                left: 0;
                width: 100%;
                height: px-to-rem(2px);
                background-color: $vidaLoca;
            }
        }
    }

    .name {
        @include hide();
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-ml) {
        [aria-hidden="true"] {
            &::after {
                content: ':';
            }
        }

        .name {
            @include show();
        }
    }
}
  • URL: /components/raw/progress/_progress.scss
  • Filesystem Path: pattern-library/patterns/01-components/progress/_progress.scss
  • Size: 1.7 KB
  • Handle: @progress
  • Preview:
    • With layout
    • Component only
  • Filesystem Path: pattern-library/patterns/01-components/progress/progress.hbs

Purpose

This component should be used when navigation is needed to get to different stages of a particular process. Since these are links that go to different pages, rather than tabs that show/hide different content on the same page, a nav element with links has been used rather than a tabpanel component.

Markup

The container should be a <nav> element with unique aria-label when there are links inside and a <div> when there are no links inside. The active page should not have a link.
